title: Deluxe King Room
description: Spacious deluxe room with a king-size bed, city view, and modern design.

title: Luxury Suite
description: Elegant suite featuring a private balcony and marble bathroom.

title: Fine Dining Area
description: Experience world-class cuisine in a stylish and comfortable setting.

description: Start your day with a rich breakfast buffet featuring local and international dishes.

description: Relax and rejuvenate with a full range of spa and massage treatments.

description: A grand and welcoming lobby with elegant decor and comfortable seating.

description: Beautifully landscaped gardens perfect for walks and outdoor events.
